title: Relates to the release of sealed court records
summary: Relates to the release of sealed court records.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3087

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. PERRY -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Codes

       AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to the  release  of
         sealed court records

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The public officers law is amended by adding a new  section
    2  81 to read as follows:
    3    S 81. RELEASE OF SEALED COURT RECORDS. 1. ANY PERSON WHO INTENTIONALLY
    4  RELEASES  OR  OTHERWISE  DISCLOSES  TO  ANOTHER THE NATURE, SUBSTANCE OR
    5  CONTENTS OF A SEALED COURT RECORD, EXCEPT IF REQUIRED BY STATUTE OR UPON
    6  WRITTEN ORDER ISSUED BY A COURT  OF  COMPETENT  JURISDICTION,  SHALL  BE
    7  GUILTY OF A CLASS A MISDEMEANOR. NOTHING CONTAINED HEREIN SHALL PROHIBIT
    8  AN  INDIVIDUAL  WHO  IS THE SUBJECT OF A SEALED COURT RECORD OR, IF SUCH
    9  PERSON IS DECEASED, THE PERSONAL REPRESENTATIVE OF HIS  OR  HER  ESTATE,
   10  FROM  DISCLOSING  TO ANOTHER THE NATURE, SUBSTANCE OR CONTENTS OF HIS OR
   11  HER COURT RECORD.
   12    2. A "SEALED COURT RECORD" SHALL MEAN ANY RECORD REQUIRED TO BE SEALED
   13  PURSUANT TO SECTION 160.50, 160.55, 160.58, 720.15,  OR  725.15  OF  THE
   14  CRIMINAL  PROCEDURE  LAW,  OR SECTION 375.1 OR 375.2 OF THE FAMILY COURT
   15  ACT.
   16    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02690-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to the release of sealed court records
